meanings.definition: Feoffees: persons to whom a fee is conveyed
meanings.sent1: The feoffees were happy to receive the fee.
meanings.sent2: The feoffees held the land on behalf of others.
meanings.sent3: The feoffees threw a party to celebrate the fee transfer.
meanings.sent4: The feoffees were like guardians of the land.
meanings.sent5: The feoffees were entrusted with the ownership of the property.

meanings.definition: Feoffees: those who hold a fee in land for another
meanings.sent1: The feoffees took care of the land for someone else.
meanings.sent2: The feoffees managed the property on behalf of the owner.
meanings.sent3: The feoffees organized a fundraiser to improve the land.
meanings.sent4: The feoffees were like stewards of the estate.
meanings.sent5: The feoffees faithfully protected the land entrusted to them.

meanings.definition: Feoffees: individuals granted a fee simple estate in land
meanings.sent1: The feoffees owned the land outright.
meanings.sent2: The feoffees had full ownership rights to the estate.
meanings.sent3: The feoffees hosted a picnic on their vast property.
meanings.sent4: The feoffees' land was their kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The feoffees enjoyed the freedom of their fee simple estate.
